channel.title: Trees wont come back after chopped?
channel.description:
After we chop a tree it doesn't come back, I have spawned these trees in the NPCSpawning.java folder so maybe I need something else for them to come back again?
[img]http://gyazo.com/081204d974cda96186d59b23074872e8.png?1340657325[/img]

item.title: Trees wont come back after chopped?
item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

Yer only thing is I’m new to like everything, I have learnt quite a few things but this seems quite complex for me and haven’t seen any tuts on how to do it.

Please someone help me fix it?

Read full topic
item.source: Trees wont come back after chopped?

item.title: Trees wont come back after chopped?
item.dc:creator: @CodeBest CodeBest
item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

that is one sexy looking 508+

@topic,
I dont know anything about 508+, but I would try making a timer, so the timer is activated to lets say, 30 seconds, when the tree turns into a stump. The timer then counts down and when it reaches zero, add whatever code you need to make your tree respawn.

or just make an event. but i dont know how that shit works on 508+

Read full topic
